Package com.pkrete.xrd4j.common.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationHelper
    This class offers helper methods for handling configuration related operations.
    Constants
    This class defines a set of constants used by other classes of the application.
    FileUtil
    This class offers helper methods for handling files.
    MessageHelper
    This class offers some helper methods for handling ServiceRequest and ServiceResponse messages.
    PropertiesUtil
    This class offers methods for loading properties files.
    SOAPHelper
    This class offers some helper methods for handling SOAPMessage objects.
    ValidationHelper
    This class offers some helper methods for validation.
